attributes.action: Debate on the potential creation of a Commonwealth Free Trade Zone
attributes.additional_details:
Would the creation of a free trade zone across the commonwealth of nations be in the interests of the commonwealth as a whole? Has increasing globalisation and the redistribution of power and influence globally created an environment that warrants a rethink on the nature of the commonwealth alliance?

This partition is not intended to presuppose that the creation of a free trade zone would be beneficial but simply to propose a debate on the subject.
